info.name: GoNintendo v4 compact
info.description: This style many of the huge boxes with in GoNintendo v4 (sidebar, top bar), and reduces the size of a few other ones (feedback, category chooser) and the header.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.1 (07/29/11): Updated to non-beta version; e.g. fixed announcement box.
Version 1.2 (07/30/11): Fixed viewstory pages.
Version 1.3 (07/30/11): Fixed live-stream box, brought latest/top stories/popular... bar back in smaller, less annoying form.
Version 1.4 (07/31/11): Fixed hiding of ads displayed as articles again, hopefully for good this time.
Version 1.5 (08/01/11): Return of the feedback boxes (expand by hovering over)
Version 1.6 (08/07/11): Fixed story filter boxes for latest site update
Version 1.7 (08/08/11): Added a quick search bar; fixed search results
Version 1.8 (08/08/11): Fixed that some things didn't work when accessing through www subdomain
Version 1.9 (08/12/11): Fixed footer z position, made it slightly transparent
Version 1.10 (08/15/11): Reduced size of footer, fixed bug with feedback boxes
Version 1.11 (08/18/11): Fixed bug that came with GoNi update
Version 1.12 (08/20/11): Fixed minor spacing bugs, search results, page jump bar getting hidden accidentally
Version 1.13 (09/09/11): Unified the logo in normal vs. forum pages / re-added logo in design mode
Version 1.14 (10/05/11): Fixed logo in non-design mode (1.13 broke it)
Version 1.15 (10/13/11): Compatibility fixes for dark theme by mad_dev; removed transparent footer again
Version 1.16 (05/16/12): Fixed first article being hidden due to changed ad layout
Version 1.17 (10/05/12): Updated for latest site design changes
Version 1.18 (05/04/13): Fixed Quickie Search for Google custom search
